Hero.title: Hi, I am
Hero.description: Programmer with three years of experience, characterized by responsibility, reliability, creativity and maintaining a positive attitude toward every challenge.
Hero.subdescription: "I am not afraid of new challenges or emerging technologies, I adapt quickly to any environment and am always willing to contribute with commitment, a positive attitude, and continuous learning to the teams that place their trust in me."

card1.title: Profile
texts: I am reserved but effective in a team. Respect, punctuality, and meeting objectives.

card4.title: Career
texts: Passionate about programming since the beginning of my career, I am excited to create algorithmic solutions.

Contact.title: Let's Connect
Contact.text: Send me a message and let's schedule a call!

items.title: Landings and E-commerces
items.description: Project for the management of landings and e-commerces of Creztu's clients, a multitenant software capable of handling and managing personal information about your business concept as a Creztu client.
items.smallDescription: Project belonging to Creztu SAS, shown here solely as part of my work experience.

items.title: Creztu
items.description: Project for landings and e-commerces management
items.smallDescription: Project belonging to Creztu SAS, shown here solely as part of my work experience.

items.title: Governance.CC
items.description: Multitenant and multi-user software capable of managing information related to a company and its clients. I worked on migrating the monolithic software to microservices and microapps, as well as migrating database information from PSQL to DynamoDB. Finally, I performed version upgrades from Java 8 to 11 and from Angular beta to 14, together with my team.
items.smallDescription: Project belonging to Creztu SAS, shown here solely as part of my work experience. (Not publicly available)
items.devStack: AngularJS, Java, Hibernate, Jakarta EE, PSQL

items.title: Chatbox-server
items.description: This project allows querying information about common diseases in dogs using a local language model (Ollama) and a fast search index based on text embeddings. It was my first experience interacting with pre-trained local AI models, where a specific behavior is configured and enriched with a previously defined context.
items.smallDescription: Personal project where I aimed to learn more about Python and the use of local models, in this case LLaMA2 from Ollama.
